text_logic_form: The lines $PR$ and $KL$ are parallel to each other.
The length of the line $KN$ is $9$ units.
The length of the line $LN$ is $16$ units.
The length of the line $PM$ is twice the length of the line $KP$.
Find the length of the line $KM$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The lines $PR$ and $KL$ are parallel to each other.
The length of the line $KN$ is $9$ units.
The length of the line $LN$ is $16$ units.
The length of the line $PM$ is twice the length of the line $KP$.
Find the length of the line $KM$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $R$ lies on the line connecting $L$ and $M$.
Point $N$ lies on the line connecting $L$ and $K$.
Point $Q$ lies on the line connecting $M$ and $N$.
Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $M$ and $K$.
Point $Q$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $P$.
The lines $NK$ and $NQ$ are perpendicular to each other.
The lines $MR$ and $MP$ are perpendicular to each other.
line_instances: There are lines $LM$, $LN$, $LR$, and $LK$, forming a quadrilateral $LMNK$.
There are lines $MP$, $MN$, $MR$, and $MK$, forming the quadrilateral $MPRK$.
There are lines $MQ$, $NK$, $NQ$, $RP$, and $RQ$, forming the quadrilateral $MQRP$.
